## axis() function

Applies axis properties to an axis group. Warning: this modifies the selection! This method updates the axis generator (see d3-axis) to ensure it has theme tick properties, Then applies formatting to the axis line, ticks, and labels according to the theme configuration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function axis(group: Selection<Element, any, Element, any>, theme: Theme, axisGenerator: Axis<any>, options?: SelectionOptions): Selection<Element, any, Element, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  group | Selection&lt;Element, any, Element, any&gt; | d3 Selection holding the axis. Usually a <g> |
|  theme | Theme | the theme |
|  axisGenerator | Axis&lt;any&gt; | d3-axis generator including scale (this should be an invoked instance of axisBottom, axisTop, axisLeft, or axisRight) |
|  options | [SelectionOptions](./d3.selectionoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> the selection options |

<b>Returns:</b>

Selection&lt;Element, any, Element, any&gt;
